name: WebEx Saved Chat Session
summary: Learn about .WCF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Meeting hosts, presenters, and attendees primarily use WCF files for documentation, follow-up communication, or record-keeping of a chat conversation after a session ends. Because the files store only chat messages and not audio, video, or screen sharing content, WCF files offer a lightweight way to preserve the text-based interactions from a WebEx session.

instructions: You can open WCF files with any text editor since the files save chat data in a plain text format. Some options include Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (macOS), and gedit (Linux).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
